name: StoryboardViewController
summary: It enables UIViewControllers to be initialized with parameters even though the are defined in storyboards
description: With StoryboardInfoProvidable and StoryboardInstantiable, you can enable UIViewControllers to be initialized with parameters even though the are defined in storyboards. Just make UIViewControllers to conform StoryboardInfoProvidable and do what the compiler says. Then you will see create methods from the UIViewControllers.
